business-schedule.title: Business to be taken in European Committees
business-schedule.division-heading: Business to be taken in European Committees
business-schedule.division-note: The following list consists of European Union Documents to be considered in European Committees. The dates appointed for consideration are provisional.

european-committee-motion.motion-text: That the Committee takes note of European Union Document No. 15049/09 and Addenda 1 to 3, Commission Communication on an EU framework for cross-border crisis management in the banking sector; and endorses the Government’s approach in agreeing the framework for cross-border crisis management. [3rd Report of Session 2009-10, HC 5-iii, Chapter 3 and 12th Report of Session 2009-10, HC 5-xi,Chapter 2].

european-committee-motion.scheduled: To be considered at 4.30 pm on 2 March 2010.
european-committee-motion.item-heading: 2 EUROPEAN DEFENCE AGENCY ACTIVITY IN 2009 AND 2010
european-committee-motion.motion-text: That the Committee takes note of unnumbered explanatory memorandum dated 3 December 2009, Report by the Head of the European Defence Agency to the Council on activities in 2009, and European Union Documents No. 16275/09, European Defence Agency document on Three year financial framework 2010–2012, postponement and 2010 Budget adoption and No. 16462/09, European Defence Agency Guidelines for the Agency’s work in 2010; and supports the Government’s aim of ensuring that the EDA is used to deliver enhanced military capability across the EU.[4th Report of Session 2009-10, HC 5-iv, Chapter 3].

european-committee-motion.scheduled: To be considered at 4.00 pm on 1 March 2010.
european-committee-motion.motion-text: That the Committee takes note of European Union Document No. 5770/10, a Council Decision on a European military mission to contribute to the training of Somali Security forces; and welcomes the Council Decision as a positive contribution to building peace and stability in Somalia. [8th Report of Session 2009-10, HC 5-vii,Chapter 2].

european-committee-motion.scheduled: To be considered at 4.00 pm on 8 March 2010.
european-committee-motion.motion-text: That the Committee takes note of European Union Document No. 5271/10, 2008 Commission Annual Report on the Implementation of the Instrument for Pre-accession Assistance, No. 14685/09, Commission Communication on Instrument for Pre-accession Assistance (IPA) Multi-Annual Indicative Financial Framework for 2011–2013, No. 15365/09, Commission Annual Report of the Instrument for Structural Policy for Pre-accession (ISPA) 2008, No. 5226/10, Commission 2008 Annual Report on PHARE, Turkey Pre-accession Instruments, CARDS and Transition Facility and No. 5516/10 Court of Auditors Special Report 16-2009, the European Commission’s Management of Pre-accession Assistance to Turkey; and urges the Commission to learn lessons from previous Enlargements, in particular the need to ensure IPA is well managed and effective. [11th Report of Session 2009-10, HC 5-x, Chapters 1 and 2 and 12th Report of Session 2009-10, HC 5-xi, Chapter 1].

european-committee-motion.scheduled: To be considered at 4.30 pm on 9 March 2010.
